## VisibleTileSet.getRenderedTileAtLocation() method

Gets the tile corresponding to the given data source and location from the rendered tiles.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getRenderedTileAtLocation(dataSource: DataSource, geoPoint: GeoCoordinates, offset?: number): Tile | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dataSource | [DataSource](./harp-mapview.datasource.md) | The data source the tile belongs to. |
|  geoPoint | [GeoCoordinates](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.md) | The geolocation included within the tile.  The tile if found among the rendered tiles, undefined otherwise. |
|  offset | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Tile](./harp-mapview.tile.md) \| undefined
